title.narrative: Gansu Tianshui Urban Infrastructure Development Project

description.narrative: The project aims to promote balanced and environmentally sustainable urbanization, and to improve living conditions in Tianshui, a second-tier city in Gansu province, PRC. It will support the restructuring and expansion of the Qinzhou district heating network; construction of urban roads and bridges, and related services such as better flood control; and stronger urban management capacity.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved heating, transport and flood control services in Tianshui municipality.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2018 (baseline year 2009) in Tianshui municipality: 1,466 jobs during project implementation are created, with 30% targeted for women, and 15% for the poor.

description.narrative: Improved heating, transport and flood control services in Tianshui municipality.

title.narrative: By 2018 (baseline year 2009) in Tianshui municipality: 658 jobs during operation are created, with 30% targeted for women, and 15% for the poor.

description.narrative: Improved heating, transport and flood control services in Tianshui municipality.

title.narrative: By 2018 (baseline year 2009) in Tianshui municipality: Incidence of seasonal flooding along Chengji flood embankment, reduced from 10% to 1% annual probability.

description.narrative: Improved heating, transport and flood control services in Tianshui municipality.

title.narrative: By 2018 (baseline year 2009) in Tianshui municipality: Heating-related CO2 emissions reduced from 1,082,200 to 559,023 tons per annum.

description.narrative: Improved heating, transport and flood control services in Tianshui municipality.

title.narrative: By 2018 (baseline year 2009) in Tianshui municipality: Defined point-to-point traveling distances are reduced by 82% from 17.8 km to 3.2 km.

description.narrative: Improved heating, transport and flood control services in Tianshui municipality.
